# sparsevectorspackage

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

An R package for storing and working with sparse numeric vectors using an S4 class.

## Installation

You can install the development version of sparsevectorspackage like so:

```{r}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("amandarob8/sparsevectorspackage")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(sparsevectorspackage)

# Create a numeric vector
x <- c(0, 5, 0, 2, 0, 3)

# Convert to sparse
sx <- as(x, "sparse_numeric")

# Convert back to dense
as(sx, "numeric")

```
